thread.title: Hong Kong dragon boat carnival opening ceremony
thread.title_full: Hong Kong dragon boat carnival opening ceremony

author: Bicky
title: Hong Kong dragon boat carnival opening ceremony
text:
GLOBAL TRAVEL NEWS » Hong Kong dragon boat carnival opening ceremony Hong Kong dragon boat carnival opening ceremony   
Organised by the Hong Kong China Dragon Boat Association (HKCDBA), co- organised by the Hong Kong Tourism Board (HKTB), and supported by the Mega Events Fund (MEF), the Hong Kong Dragon Boat Carnival will be staged in Victoria Harbour and Tsim Sha Tsui East from 3 to 5 July. The highlights of this year’s carnival are the CCB (Asia) Hong Kong International Dragon Boat Races, and the San Miguel BeerFest. 

The opening ceremony of the carnival, and the International Breast Cancer Survivor Championship, one of the special races of this year’s CCB (Asia) Hong Kong International Dragon Boat Races, will be held tomorrow.
